tool_description: Enables various geodetic functions like buffers, points from distance and direction, points along path and wedge construction.
name: geodetic
title: geodetic

api_list.name: azimuth
api_list.description:
Calculates the corresponding azimuth using a 32-wind compass rose.
A direction of N equals an azimuth of 0 and a direction of S equals an azimuth of 180.
